General.Name: Merko Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Merko Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a processor and exporter of tomatoes into the raw material for the food industry worldwide. It processes tomatoes into tomato paste and diced tomato for industrial applications, as well as tomato juice concentrates. Merko Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Balmumcu Mah. Mustafa Izzet Efendi Sk.No, Istanbul, Turkey
